name: LumberJack (Cartraige) (Cartraige) (Cartraige)
description:
You play as a Lumberjack in this short fantasy survival game. Constantly choose between power or health while surviving against the slime ghouls and the winter. 

In this fantasy world you will have to cut down trees and sustain your campfire while surviving against the winter, the slime ghouls and THE FINAL OGRE BOSS.

Add fuel to your magical campfire to give you more strength. The red fire gives you extra speed and an axe throwing ability(SUPER OP), while the blue flames can heal you. CHOOSE!!!
